title: Tinkle Tinkle Little Star
text_plain: Tinkle, tinkle, little star, How you pee the way you are! Up above the potty so high, Like a diaper in the sky.
text_html:
Tinkle, tinkle, little star,
How you pee the way you are!
Up above the potty so high,
Like a diaper in the sky.
description: This is a silly version to sing while potty-training your youngster.  I'm not very proud of it.  Please feel free to improve it!

title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Starfruit
text_plain: Twinkle, twinkle, little starfruit, How I wonder what you are! At the market priced so high, Like a diamond I won't buy.
text_html:
Tinkle, tinkle, little starfruit,
How I wonder what you are!
At the market priced so high,
Like a diamond I won't buy.
description: A humble ode to the mysterious starfruit
